data.question: What is the empirical formula of NPF-500?
At what temperature (K) was the crystal data for NPF-500-H2TCPP collected?
What is the space group of NPF-500-NiTCPP?
How does the BET Surface Area of NPF-500 compare to NPF-500-H2TCPP?
data.answer: NPF-500 has a higher BET Surface Area than NPF-500-H2TCPP.

data.question: What is the role of trifluoroacetic acid in the synthesis of NPF-500?
data.answer: Trifluoroacetic acid acts as a modulating agent in the synthesis of NPF-500.

data.question: True or False: The crystal system of NPF-500 and NPF-500-H2TCPP is the same.
What is the conversion percentage when using NPF-500-H2TCPP as a photocatalyst for the oxygenation of thioanisole?
True or False: NPF-500-H2TCPP can be recycled for five times without significant decrease of the activity.
What is the maximum occupancy percentage of NiTCPP in NPF-500-NiTCPP according to 1H NMR digestion results?
True or False: The emission spectrum of H4L in DMF peaks at around 440 nm.
What is the effect of increasing the amount of NiTCPP in the synthesis of NPF-500-NiTCPP?
data.answer: Increasing the amount of NiTCPP can lead to a higher occupancy percentage of NiTCPP in NPF-500-NiTCPP.

data.question: True or False: The PXRD patterns of NPF-500-H2TCPP remain unchanged after 5 catalytic runs.
What is the role of benzoic acid in the synthesis of NPF-500 series MOFs?
data.answer: Benzoic acid acts as a co-modulating agent in the synthesis of NPF-500 series MOFs.

data.question: True or False: The crystal system of NPF-500 is tetragonal.
What is the BET Surface Area of NPF-500-NiTCPP?
True or False: The emission spectrum of a mixture of H2TCPP and NPF-500 in DMF peaks at around 660 nm.
What is the conversion percentage for the photosensitized oxygenation of thioanisole using PCN-222 as a photocatalyst?
True or False: The absorption spectrum of H2TCPP in DMF peaks at around 425 nm.
What is the effect of pH treatment on the PXRD patterns of NPF-500?
data.answer: The PXRD patterns of NPF-500 remain consistent after acid, water, and base treatment, indicating its stability.

data.question: True or False: The emission lifetime of H4L in NPF-500 is shorter than in NPF-500-H2TCPP.
